title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health (Provision of Information
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health (Provision of Information 

for Health Examination and Treatment Service) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health (provision information health examination treatment service) regulation 2024

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“General Data Protection Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 20161 on the protection of 
natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free 
movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data 
Protection Regulation); 

“personal data” has the meaning it has in the General Data Protection 
Regulation; 

“processing”, in relation to personal data, has the meaning it has in the General 
Data Protection Regulation; 

“school” means a recognised school within the meaning of section 2 of the 
Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998).
text_norm: 2 regulation - general data protection regulation mean regulation (eu) 2016 679 european parliament council 27 april 20161 protection natural person regard processing personal data free movement data repealing directive 95 46 ec (general data protection regulation) personal data meaning general data protection regulation processing relation personal data meaning general data protection regulation school mean recognised school within meaning section 2 education act 1998 (no 51 1998)

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 3. Where the Health Service Executive has made available without charge
text_raw:
3. Where the Health Service Executive has made available without charge 
a health examination and treatment service for pupils who attend any primary 
school or who are taught at home in accordance with section 66 of the Health 
Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), the Health Service Executive may request information 
from a school manager or governing body of a school regarding such pupils 
attending that school.
text_norm: 3 health service executive made available without charge health examination treatment service pupil attend primary school taught home accordance section 66 health act 1970 (no 1 1970) health service executive may request information school manager governing body school regarding pupil attending school

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 4. The information requested in accordance with Regulation 3 may include:
text_raw:
4. The information requested in accordance with Regulation 3 may include: 

(a) 

the name, address, date of birth and sex of the pupil; 

(b) 

the birth surname of the mother of the pupil; 

(c) 

(d) 

the name, phone number and email address of the parent or 
guardian of the pupil; 

the personal public service number (if any) (within the meaning 
of section 262 of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 
26 of 2005)) of the pupil; 

1 OJ No. L119, 4.5.2016, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd January, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [750] 3 

(e) 

(f) 

the name of the school which the pupil attends; 

the school roll number for the pupil.
text_norm: 4 information requested accordance regulation 3 may include (a) name address date birth sex pupil (b) birth surname mother pupil (c) (d) name phone number email address parent guardian pupil personal public service number (if any) (within meaning section 262 social welfare consolidation act 2005 (no 26 2005)) pupil 1 oj no l119 4.5.2016 p 1 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 3rd january 2025 750 3 (e) (f) name school pupil attends school roll number pupil

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 5. Where the Health Service Executive requests information in accordance
text_raw:
5. Where the Health Service Executive requests information in accordance 
with Regulation 3, a school manager or governing body shall provide such 
information requested in writing within 10 days of such request being made.
text_norm: 5 health service executive request information accordance regulation 3 school manager governing body shall provide information requested writing within 10 day request made

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 6. Personal data, including special categories of personal data, provided
text_raw:
6. Personal data, including special categories of personal data, provided 
under these Regulations may be processed by the Health Service Executive in 
accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation and the Data Protection 
Act 2018 (No. 7 of 2018) where necessary and proportionate for the performance 
of its functions under Regulation 3.
text_norm: 6 personal data including special category personal data provided regulation may processed health service executive accordance general data protection regulation data protection act 2018 (no 7 2018) necessary proportionate performance function regulation 3

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 7. For the purposes of these Regulations, the Health Service Executive is
text_raw:
7. For the purposes of these Regulations, the Health Service Executive is 
designated as a data controller in relation to personal data processed by it 
pursuant to Regulation 6.
text_norm: 7 purpose regulation health service executive designated data controller relation personal data processed pursuant regulation 6

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: 8. Personal data processed for the purposes referred to in Regulation 6 shall
text_raw:
8. Personal data processed for the purposes referred to in Regulation 6 shall 
not be retained for any period beyond which it is required and shall be 
permanently deleted after it is no longer required. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [750]
text_norm: 8 personal data processed purpose referred regulation 6 shall retained period beyond required shall permanently deleted longer required given official seal 17 december 2024 stephen donnelly minister health 4 750

title: conferred on me by section 72 of the Health Act 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This regulation will permit the sharing of data by schools to the HSE for the 
purpose of carrying out health examinations under the School Health 
Programme. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [750] 5
